title: Failure to redirect connection to TS through the RD Gateway
author: Giuliano-GPereira
body_snippet:
Failure to redirect connection to TS through the RD Gateway
## Expected Behavior
Importing an existing and functioning RDP connection file and using the loadbalanceinfo field should provide the possibility to connect to and RD Gateway and immediately redirect to a TS application.

## Current Behavior
Through the file import, MR is connecting to RD Gateway server, but it's not redirecting to the TS.
